Google Ads is complex. We believe that this is by design.

So this is your opportunity to succeed where others have failed and I’m going to show you how to make sense of this confusing mess they call Google Ads!

It is written by Aaron Weiner from Software Promotions. They’ve been helping small software companies with Google Ads since almost as long as Google Ads has existed, so you can safely assume they know their stuff.
